summary: By means of archival footage, this mockumentary "reconstructs" how the Russians secretly realised the first manned flight to the moon as early as the 1930s.
cast: Boris Vlasov|Viktoriya Ilyinskaya|Anatoliy Otradnov|Aleksei Slavnin|Viktor Kotov|Andrey Osipov|Aleksey Anisimov|Igor Sannikov|Nina Kameneva|Polina Litovskaya|Sergey Paramonov
title: Pervye na Lune
